about.title: Hello there !
paragraphs: I'm a data scientist looking for a position in the field, eager to work with creative, kind and ambitious people!

Experienced in AI research and the development of deep learning solutions. Passionate about continuous learning and mastering AI concepts, with a demonstrated ability to navigate through technical and complex fields. Highly proficient in Python, skilled in writing clean, robust, and scalable code to design, engineer, and implement machine learning systems.
When I'm not in front of a computer screen, I'm probably out with my friends, playing tennis, enjoying a cup of coffee, or wandering around the city trying to catch a great sunset!

projects.title: Projects
projects.subheader: Welcome to my projects section! Here you'll find some of my creatins over the years.
